column4: hey guys. is there some way to get a bit more usability features out of nautilus? thinking about such non-gnome features, like the spacebar quick-view available under mac, of the grouping of files by type available in win explorer
Nautilus>View>Arrange Items>By Type. and, no there is not quick look in nautilus ;P

nah, got that (same happens when clicking on type or any other heading on list view); it's some of the refinements of some of the other platforms that i miss a bit, now that I'm no longer using those platforms at all
u know of any file managers w a git more flavor to it?
